text.div:
Diagnostic Markers

Codes to indicate clinically relevant bio markers.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ncit.owl where concept descends from NCIT:C36292

name: DiagnosticMarkers
title: Diagnostic Markers
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
description: Codes to indicate clinically relevant bio markers.
